summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue South from a point 120 feet north of Plum to Massachusetts Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 16651, creating Local Improvement District No. 1540 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
